title: At COP26, World Governments Agree to Strengthen Emissions Pledges, Formulate Carbon-Trading Market
content:
1. At COP26, World Governments Agree to Strengthen Emissions Pledges, Formulate Carbon-Trading Market  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Nations reach climate change agreement in Glasgow but follow-through in doubt  Yahoo News
  3. COP26 climate deal includes historic reference to fossil fuels but doesn't meet urgency of the crisis  CNN
  4. It could have been worse, but our leaders failed us at Cop26. That’s the truth of it.  The Guardian
  5. Cop26 has been a failure and our lacklustre world leaders are to blame  The Independent
contentSnippet:
At COP26, World Governments Agree to Strengthen Emissions Pledges, Formulate Carbon-Trading Market  The Wall Street Journal
Nations reach climate change agreement in Glasgow but follow-through in doubt  Yahoo News
COP26 climate deal includes historic reference to fossil fuels but doesn't meet urgency of the crisis  CNN
It could have been worse, but our leaders failed us at Cop26. That’s the truth of it.  The Guardian
Cop26 has been a failure and our lacklustre world leaders are to blame  The Independent

localize.title: COP26で世界各国政府が排出権の強化と炭素取引市場の形成に合意
在COP26会议上，世界各国政府同意加强排放承诺，制定碳交易市场
在COP26會議上，世界各國政府同意加強排放承諾，制定碳交易市場
